tool_description: An API to get info about the latest 50 clips from a channel, including direct download links
name: Twitch Channel Clips
title: Twitch Channel Clips

api_list.name: Get Clips
api_list.description: Get the latest 50 clips of a channel.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-channel-clips.p.rapidapi.com/public/clips/jakubloveshorror"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-channel-clips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-channel-clips.p.rapidapi.com/public/clips/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-channel-clips.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
